text: Frederick Charles "Fireball" Wenz (August 26, 1941 – October 6, 2020) was an American middle relief pitcher in Major League Baseball. He played from 1968 through 1970 for the Boston Red Sox (1968–69) and Philadelphia Phillies (1970). He was born in Bound Brook, New Jersey. Wenz died on October 6, 2020 in Branchburg, New Jersey at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== *Sons of Sam Horn Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey
title: Fred Wenz
